tossup_question: 18) EARTH AND SPACE  Which of the following statements is false concerning plutonic igneous rocks?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) They tend to be made up of large crystals 
X) They are usually formed by the solidification of lava 
Y) They generally have phaneritic texture 
Z) They are a major component of the Sierra Nevadas
tossup_answer: ANSWER: X) They are usually formed by the solidification of lava
bonus_question: 18) EARTH AND SPACE  For what percentage of the outermost 16 kilometers of the Earth do sedimentary rocks account, by volume?
